name: Revival Blessing
effect: User targets a fainted ally, if successful, the user spends 3 Will points and the target is brought back with 50% HP (rounded up). Can only be successfully used once per Battle. The target acts immediately after the user if their place in initiative has passed in the current round.
description: The Pokemon bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokemon that has fainted. This leaves it feeling pensive and drained for quite awhile.
